lines.text: Mr. Bravo, you're accused of littering. Do you have a lawyer?
No, your honor. I'll be defending myself.
[makes karate moves]
Hoohahuh!
Are you familiar with the saying that any man who defends himself has a fool for a client?
Then, I'm hired!
All right, Mr. Bravo, how do you plead?
Like this -
[in begging voice]
Please, oh, plea-ease!

[slams hammer]
I could hold you in contempt.
I don't care how you hold me, just hold me.
Mr. Bravo! Do you have anything to say in your defense?
I sweat a lot, but my breath is minty fresh.
Mr. Bravo. Normally I dismiss cases like yours, but in this instance, I'm going to sentence you to 86 consecutive life sentences.
All right... wait, is that bad?
Take this knuckle-walking Neandertal out of here!

[being dragged away]
Uhm, can I have that lawyer now?
[Repeated line]
Woah, momma.
What kind of idiot are you?
I don't know, what kinds are there?
Now remember, I do my best work when I'm being worshipped as a god.
I am investigating the disappearance of all the cats in the city... my living room is full of cats... that means...
[pause]
I'm hungry!

[shouts]
Look, Mommy! That guy's looking at pictures of almost naked men!
[the whole store stares at Johnny]
This is a men's fitness magazine, I want to look *like* this, not at this... I've got nothin' to be ashamed of!
[walks up to cashier ashamed, and drops change on the counter]
... TV Guide.
Don't touch the hair!
Hey, Foxy Mama. You smell kinda pretty, wanna smell me? Hoohah!
Great Scott. My pizza-sense is tingling.
You know, you'd think a person with that much hate in her heart wouldn't gravitate towards the service industry.
Ehh, e-everyone stay calm... because we're all doomed!

[in car, pointing on map]
Let's take this blue road.
That's a river.
It'll be scenic.
Thanks for saving our neighborhood,Kung Foo Guy! But how did you know they were killer robots?
Robots...?
Here's your money, Susie. Thanks to you, everything is back to normal.
Or is it?
Sweet. Bring on the Danish chicks and cream soda.
Mama mia. That's a spicy meatball.
I hope this doesn't go on my permanent record.
Fetch me the Fez of Forgetfulness.
